sense.def:
A transplant
je kirurška operacija, pri kateri presadijo oboleli del telesa.

seg.quote: ...allegations of a trade in human organs for transplant.
Doctors hope to transplant a human heart into the patient within the next few days.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is transplanted
, tisto prenesemo drugam.

seg.quote: ...how an established technology can be transplanted to another region.
